kpi.name: M1008C261

kpi_info.title: FAILED HSPA INTER-RNC IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter-RNC HSPA IFHOs due to UE being lost. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond with RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE and the core network does not send RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND.

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED HSPA INTER-RNC IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
